channel.title: Were did you learn java?
channel.description: i'm not the best coder i've did seangreasly (in a hypo thetical way) and i didn't learn that much cause you have to buy the rest after you wach 9 movies and i was wondering were i could learn java for free? and if theres a site to teach you runescape private server java speccifically i could use that!.

item.title: Were did you learn java?
item.dc:creator: @zsakul2 zsakul2
item.description:
@zsakul2 wrote:

ty for the free sean greaslys now i’ve learned java and i didn’t have to do sean greasly =p… lol jk but umm i may make a quest and donate it too wixter mabye even agility skill if i can make it lol rsj (runescape java) is fun now its all i do except me my gf and my bed peace
(if this double post it cause i keep retrying to post cause it says theres a error)

item.title: Were did you learn java?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

[quote=“MrWicked, post:2, topic:4944”]Practice, play around, use your immagination to think up ideas then when you have those ideas make it a goal to complete them. But at first dont set your standards to high or you wont go anywhere.

Just keep at it and you will progress extremely fast, because runescape coding I wouldnt really call real java.[/quote]

Agreed!

Here was my first thing which I done cpmpletely on my own:

/* This Java is my first. It will calculate the ammount of keystrokes you can press in three minutes if you press 3 every second. */ class KeysPerMins { public static void main(String args[]) { int kps, k; double keys; kps = 6; kps = 6 ; //This is stating how many keys per second you are making k = kps * 180; System.out.println("Keys Per 3 Mins: " + k + "!"); } } // This Java was created by Chris :)

Read full topic

item.title: Were did you learn java?
item.dc:creator: @oddinn686 oddinn686
item.description:
@oddinn686 wrote:

zsakul2:

that site didn’t work it took me to some numbers

The numbers corispond to the number of the tutorial. Just click on it and it will bring you to another page. Click on the .htm link and it will bring you to the tutorial.

On another note to learn Java you should get a book. I prefer ebooks because they are free (if you can find someone that wants to upload one for you)

item.title: Were did you learn java?
item.dc:creator: @MrWicked MrWicked
item.description:
@MrWicked wrote:

Practice, play around, use your immagination to think up ideas then when you have those ideas make it a goal to complete them. But at first dont set your standards to high or you wont go anywhere.

Just keep at it and you will progress extremely fast, because runescape coding I wouldnt really call real java.

Read full topic
